tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WasteManagement (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  waste_type VARCHAR(50),
  disposal_method VARCHAR(100),
  quantity DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE waste_records (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  date_recorded DATE,
  disposal_method_id INT REFERENCES disposal_methods(id)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_management_practices (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  practice_name VARCHAR(255),
  practice_description TEXT,
  practice_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE disposal_methods (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  method_name VARCHAR(255),
  method_description TEXT,
  method_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE waste_categories (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(255),
  category_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE disposal_sites (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name VARCHAR(255),
  site_address VARCHAR(255),
  site_capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_management_practices (
    waste_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    waste_type VARCHAR(255),
    collection_date DATE,
    collection_point VARCHAR(255),
    disposal_method VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_points (
    point_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    point_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    capacity INT,
    collection_frequency VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE disposal_methods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    method_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_categories (
    category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(255),
    category_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE disposal_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    waste_id INT,
    method_id INT,
    collection_date DATE,
    disposal_date DATE
)
